explains: adj. 神经过敏的；神经病的
n. 神经病患者；神经过敏者

sentences.en: He was almost neurotic about being followed.
sentences.cn: 他对被人跟踪几乎神经过敏。

sentences.en: She became neurotic about keeping the house clean.
sentences.cn: 她对保持房子清洁有点神经质。

sentences.en: Meprobamate and benactyzine are helpful in the treatment of neurotic psychotic depression.
sentences.cn: 眠尔通和胃复康有助于精神抑郁症的治疗。
